Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
Deprecated Classes
org.jhotdraw.draw.BorderRectangleFigure
          This class should be in one of the samples package 
org.jhotdraw.samples.svg.SVGFigureFactoryOld
          This class will be removed soon. 
org.jhotdraw.samples.svg.SVGUtil
          This class will be removed. 
 

Deprecated Fields
org.jhotdraw.draw.AttributeKeys.STROKE_INNER_WIDTH_FACTOR
          This is not flexible enough. Lets replace this with a STROKE_STRIPES_ARRAY and a IS_STROKE_STRIPES_FACTOR. 
 

Deprecated Methods
net.n3.nanoxml.XMLElement.getAttribute(String)
          As of NanoXML/Java 2.1, replaced by XMLElement.getAttribute(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Returns the value of an attribute. 
net.n3.nanoxml.IXMLElement.getAttribute(String)
          As of NanoXML/Java 2.0.1, replaced by IXMLElement.getAttribute(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Returns the value of an attribute. 
 

Deprecated Enum Constants
org.jhotdraw.draw.AttributeKeys.StrokeType.DOUBLE
          This is not flexible enough. Lets replace this with STRIPED. for example to support for striped strokes.
